name: DiwaliSounds
0:
”Alexa, launch Diwali Sounds”
”Alexa, open Diwali Sounds”
”Alexa, play Diwali Sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: diwali sounds
des: We love celebrating Diwali with friends and family and at the heart of these festivities are the magical sounds of fireworks. Just say 'Alexa, launch Diwali Sounds'. Alexa will play this 30 minutes audio on loop.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
